bibl.title: Women, Wealth and Power in the Roman Empire
bibl.seg: PÖLÖNEN Janne, The Division of Wealth between Men and Women in Roman Succession (c.a. 50 BC - AD 250).

Pâivi SETÄLÄ, Ria BERG, Riikka HÄLIKKÄ, Minerva KELTANEN, Janne PÖLÖNEN and Ville VUOLANTO, Women, Wealth and Power in the Roman Empire = Acta Instituti Romani Finlandiae. 25 (Roma, 2002) pp. 147-179, 1 tabl.
